title: Open Challenges in Multi-Agent Security: Towards Secure Systems of Interacting AI Agents
authors: Christian Schroeder de Witt et al.
abstract_summary: Comprehensive framework for multi-agent security addressing coordinated attacks and network-amplified vulnerabilities in decentralized agent architectures

title: Multi-Agent Systems Execute Arbitrary Malicious Code
authors: Harold Triedman; Rishi Jha; Vitaly Shmatikov
abstract_summary: Demonstrates 58-90% success rate for web-based attacks forcing execution of arbitrary malicious code in LLM-based multi-agent systems

title: Agentic AI Security: Threats Defenses Evaluation and Open Challenges
authors: Shrestha Datta; Shahriar Kabir Nahin; Anshuman Chhabra; Prasant Mohapatra
abstract_summary: Comprehensive threat taxonomy for agentic AI systems with evaluation methods and defense strategies

title: The Dark Side of LLMs: Agent-based Attacks for Complete Computer Takeover
abstract_summary: 100% vulnerability rate for inter-agent trust exploitation allowing malicious agents to coerce systems into autonomously installing malware

title: Why Do Multi-Agent LLM Systems Fail?
authors: Mert Cemri; Melissa Z. Pan; Shuyi Yang et al.
abstract_summary: Introduces MAST-Data dataset of 1600+ annotated traces revealing 14 failure modes including inter-agent misalignment and coordination issues

title: TRiSM for Agentic AI: A Review of Trust Risk and Security Management in LLM-based Agentic Multi-Agent Systems
authors: Shaina Raza; Ranjan Sapkota; Manoj Karkee; Christos Emmanouilidis
abstract_summary: Examines trust risk and security frameworks with novel metrics for inter-agent collaboration quality and tool utilization

title: Security of Internet of Agents: Attacks and Countermeasures
authors: Yuntao Wang; Yanghe Pan; Shaolong Guo; Zhou Su
abstract_summary: Identifies four critical threat areas in IoA systems: identity authentication vulnerabilities cross-agent trust deficiencies embodied system risks

title: A Survey of LLM-Driven AI Agent Communication: Protocols Security Risks and Defense Countermeasures
abstract_summary: Comprehensive survey of emerging protocols (MCP A2A) and three-tier communication vulnerability taxonomy with novel defense strategies

title: Web Fraud Attacks Against LLM-Driven Multi-Agent Systems
authors: Dezhang Kong; Hujin Peng; Yilun Zhang et al.
abstract_summary: Develops 11 attack variants exploiting link validation vulnerabilities in multi-agent systems with high success rates

title: Achilles Heel of Distributed Multi-Agent Systems
authors: Yiting Zhang; Yijiang Li; Tianwei Zhao; Kaijie Zhu; Haohan Wang; Nuno Vasconcelos
abstract_summary: Red-teaming evaluation revealing 80% performance degradation and 100% success rates for free riding and malicious attacks

title: AI Agents Under Threat: A Survey of Key Security Challenges and Future Pathways
authors: Zehang Deng; Yongjian Guo; Changzhou Han; Wanlun Ma; Junwu Xiong; Sheng Wen; Yang Xiang
abstract_summary: Comprehensive survey identifying four primary security knowledge gaps in AI agent vulnerabilities

title: A Vision for Access Control in LLM-based Agent Systems
authors: Xinfeng Li; Dong Huang; Jie Li; Hongyi Cai; Zhenhong Zhou; Wei Dong; XiaoFeng Wang; Yang Liu
abstract_summary: Proposes Agent Access Control framework with context-aware information governance for multi-agent systems

title: SentinelNet: Safeguarding Multi-Agent Collaboration Through Credit-Based Dynamic Threat Detection
abstract_summary: Introduces decentralized security framework achieving near-perfect detection of malicious agents with 95% accuracy restoration

title: Extending the OWASP Multi-Agentic System Threat Modeling Guide: Insights from Multi-Agent Security Research
authors: Klaudia Krawiecka; Christian Schroeder de Witt
abstract_summary: Proposes enhancements to OWASP framework with new threat categories for multi-agent systems

title: A Survey on Agentic Security: Applications Threats and Defenses
authors: Asif Shahriar; Md Nafiu Rahman; Sadif Ahmed; Farig Sadeque; Md Rizwan Parvez
abstract_summary: Comprehensive taxonomy of 160+ papers covering AI agent security vulnerabilities and protective measures
